name: SpaceWar! (itch) (Avocadokat)
description:
SpaceWar is an epic remix of a classic 1958 space shooter that day viewed in a time of the coldwar. It is you verses one of your friend's taking the control's of another star fighter and on top you and the other must watch out for mines! Who will be the victor!? The dynamic of this simple game tells the rest...

Sprites and animations created by Avedis Ghazarian

Sound effects such as firing and explosions created by BFXR.

Background beat music was downloaded from http://www.classicgaming.cc/classics/asteroids/sounds
